talk_1010:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Please choose which horse you'd like to
put there.
talk_1012:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>OK! <sp:5:1:0>Just give me a holler from the
<clr:0000>paddock <clr:ffff>to bring a horse inside.
talk_0160:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_00>Looks like at least one of your room
units is <clr:0000>sticking out <clr:ffff>over the <clr:0000>rope<clr:ffff>.

I'm sorry, but that's just not safe.<sp:5:1:0>
Please readjust your design so that
everything <clr:0000>fits inside <clr:ffff>the rope!
talk_0161:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>...<snd:Notice_01>Whoops. <sp:5:0:0>This is awkward. There's no
room for another room!

But if you still want to purchase this, you
can, and I'll just hold on to it for you.

Sound fair? If so, that'll be <clr:0000><sp:2:2:2c:2600530068006f0070005f00540072006100640065004900740065006d0050007200690063006500ffff00cd> rupees<clr:ffff>.
talk_2001: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Do your walls need an extra something?
talk_0162:
<sp:3:0:2:0501><snd:Think_01>Oh... <sp:5:0:0>There doesn't seem to be enough
open space to put the room here.

Try adjusting your room placement.
talk_0140:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>Huh? You aren't using a single
room, but...

<sp:3:0:2:0801>It has a certain sense of spaciousness.
Just a different kind of vision for a dream
home, I suppose!
talk_2003:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>So this is going to be the inspiration for
my painting?
talk_0141:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>We can't start construction yet since
something's in the way. Would you mind
clearing out the plot of land?
talk_2004:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal_01>No art today?<sp:0:4:0>Well, if you do come across a picture
you'd like to display, just say the word!
Com_Talk_15: <sp:3:0:2:0301><snd:Sad>I'm sorry. <sp:5:0:0>I can't buy that from you.
talk_0142:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy><sp:0:2:2:7d00>Thank you for your purchase!<sp:0:2:2:6400><sp:0:4:0>Please wait a moment <sp:5:0:0>while I clean up
the preview room.
Com_Talk_16: <sp:3:0:2:0401><snd:SurpriseS>Hey! I can't buy the clothes off your back!
talk_0143:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>OK. <sp:5:1:0>I'm going to clean up the room,
so please step back.
talk_2006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Hurrah! <sp:5:0:0>A masterpiece, I must say.<sp:0:4:0>This will certainly liven up your room.
Please enjoy!
Greeting_Rain:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Greeting>Hello! It's a bit wet, eh? But you make
your own sunshine, I always say!
talk_0167:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Sorry, but...<sp:5:0:0>the preview space is a
bit cluttered.

If you want to preview a room, please
tidy up the space first!
talk_0144: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>You got it! What do you want to know?
talk_2007:
<sp:3:0:2:0801>I'm not a bad artist. If you show me
an example, I can paint a copy for you
to display.
talk_0168:
I'll hold on to the room you purchased.<sp:5:0:0>
You'll have to adjust your current rooms
before you can place it.
talk_0145:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The only things you can place on the plot
of land are our proprietary <clr:0000>room units<clr:ffff>.

It's a matter of safety, you understand.
We can't ensure structural integrity with
anything else!
Also, you'll want to avoid having anything
stick out over the <clr:0000>rope<clr:ffff>, as that tends to
cause problems.
talk_0122:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>If you up and left during construction,
I don't know what I'd do with myself.

Just tell me if you want to wrap up, OK?
talk_0100:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Do you have a construction request?
Well, you're in the right place!
talk_0146:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:LaughS_01>The trick to placing rooms is trying lots of
different things!

Just as the name implies, room units are
built with a common standard.

Which means you can place them
vertically, horizontally, diagonally—<sp:5:0:0>
however-ally!
<sp:3:0:2:0000>But!<sp:5:0:0> You may want to think twice about
placing your room units at a <clr:0000>steep angle<clr:ffff>.

If you do, you may be <clr:0000>unable to place
accessories or use room features<clr:ffff>.
So bear that in mind.
talk_2009:
<sp:3:0:2:0001><snd:QuestionNormal>No art today?<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0c01>Oh, I see. You don't have any pictures to
use as a reference.

<sp:3:0:2:0701><snd:Notice_00>Hmm... <sp:5:0:0>Maybe you should look into
getting a <clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff>?

It's a great tool that <clr:0000>can record an image
of anything you look at<clr:ffff>. My father told me
about it!
With a <clr:0000>camera<clr:ffff>, you could get a whole lot
of pictures to base paintings off of.

<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you're interested in getting one, go talk
to my father at <clr:0000>Lookout Landing<clr:ffff>.
talk_0101:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Thanks for waiting! We're all set to
begin construction!
talk_0147:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>You can place up to <clr:0000><sp:2:e:3e:38004d00790048006f006d0065004200750069006c006400650072005f004f007500740070007500740048006f007500730065004e0075006d00ffff00cd><clr:ffff> <sp:c9:6:2c:120072006f006f006d00200075006e0069007400140072006f006f006d00200075006e006900740073000000> on the
plot of land.

If you want to swap rooms, please place
rooms you don't want <clr:0000>outside the rope<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>When construction is finished, I'll collect
the rooms you put there!

Oh, and remember, if I'm holding on to
rooms for you, you can ask me to <clr:0000>take
them out <clr:ffff>at any time.
talk_0102:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Which room catches your fancy? You can
preview any of them free of charge!
talk_0148:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>Anything else? You're welcome to ask the
same question again! I don't mind!
talk_0149:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>...<snd:Notice_01>Hold up! <sp:5:0:0>You've hit capacity for <clr:0000>rooms<clr:ffff>
on this plot of land.

Sorry, but I've already placed <sp:2:e:3e:38004d00790048006f006d0065004200750069006c006400650072005f004f007500740070007500740048006f007500730065004e0075006d00ffff00cd> rooms
out there, and <clr:0000><sp:2:e:3e:38004d00790048006f006d0065004200750069006c006400650072005f004f007500740070007500740048006f007500730065004e0075006d00ffff00cd> is the maximum<clr:ffff>.

But tell you what. You can still purchase
this room, and I'll hold on to it for you.

That'll set you back <clr:0000><sp:2:2:2c:2600530068006f0070005f00540072006100640065004900740065006d0050007200690063006500ffff00cd> rupees<clr:ffff>.
What do you say?
talk_0105:
<sp:3:0:2:0801><snd:TalkPositive>All right. <sp:5:0:0>It's ready!


<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll remove the room when you're done
looking around. Just let me know!
talk_0106:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thank you for your purchase! And look,
everything is ready to go.
talk_0129:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>I'm sorry. It seems there's another unit
in the space meant for previewing rooms.
talk_0107:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:Tired_00>I've finished those preparations. Let me
know when you're finished!
talk_0109:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Tired_00>Thanks for waiting! <sp:5:0:0>I've removed the
preview room.
0113: I've seen all I need to.
talk_0201:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Wow!<sp:5:0:0> That was my last room!<sp:5:1:0> Now you've
got the complete set!

May I say, I'm delighted by your passion
for home design.

Thank you for choosing Hudson
Construction for all your building needs.
Now please, enjoy your dream home!
talk_0202:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>You've already purchased all the rooms
in our selection. Now all that's left is to
enjoy your dream home!
talk_1001:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Great! <sp:5:1:0>I'll contact the Stable Association
and make the arrangements.
talk_1002:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Sorry. <sp:5:1:0>You don't seem to have any
horses registered.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>Let's try this again after you've registered
one at a stable!
talk_1003: <sp:3:0:2:0700>Shall I put your horse in the paddock?
talk_0170:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I'll return any boarded horses to
the stable.
talk_0171: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Which room are we looking at today?
talk_1005:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh, sorry. <sp:5:1:0>I'm not allowed to handle wild
horses. You'll have to register it at a
stable first.
talk_0172:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let me know when you're done building
your home.<sp:5:0:0> Then I'll inspect it!
talk_1006:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Thanks for waiting! I brought your
horse here.

Safe and graceful travels to you!
Com_Talk_00: <sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:TalkPositive>Very good! <sp:5:1:0>What do you want to sell?
talk_0150:
<sp:3:0:2:0501>...<snd:Notice_01>Hang on! <sp:5:0:0>You've hit capacity for <clr:0000>rooms<clr:ffff>
on this plot of land.

Sorry, but I've already placed <sp:2:e:3e:38004d00790048006f006d0065004200750069006c006400650072005f004f007500740070007500740048006f007500730065004e0075006d00ffff00cd> rooms
out there, and <clr:0000><sp:2:e:3e:38004d00790048006f006d0065004200750069006c006400650072005f004f007500740070007500740048006f007500730065004e0075006d00ffff00cd> is the maximum<clr:ffff>.

But tell you what. You can still purchase
this room, and I'll hold on to it for you.

How's that sound? If you're interested,
it'll be <clr:0000><sp:2:2:2c:2600530068006f0070005f00540072006100640065004900740065006d0050007200690063006500ffff00cd> rupees<clr:ffff>.
talk_0173:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Think_00>One of the rooms is teetering. It appears
to be <clr:0000>unsteady<clr:ffff>. <sp:5:1:0>That's not safe!

Please make sure it's stable, and then talk
to me again.
talk_1007:
<sp:3:0:2:0100><snd:TalkPositive>I've guided <clr:0000><sp:2:4:0><clr:ffff> to
the paddock!

If you want to take it out, please call for
me again from the <clr:0000>paddock<clr:ffff>.
talk_0151: <sp:3:0:2:0700>So, what can I do for you, then?
talk_1008:
I'll bring it somewhere safe, away from the
construction area.
talk_0153:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>It seems as though <clr:0000>something else is
in the way<clr:ffff>, so we can't safely construct
anything right now.
talk_0176:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Of course!<sp:5:1:0> I'll prepare that for you right
away. Just a moment!
talk_0130:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Would you like me to move any rooms in
the preview space to your storage?
talk_0131:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Hey! Hi! Hello! Are you ready for all your
habitation dreams to come true? You're in
luck—we're building <clr:0000>dream homes<clr:ffff>!
This plot will soon be a first-rate home
with sweeping views of Akkala.

A dream home of this caliber comes with
a hefty price tag, but I assure you every
rupee is well worth it.
<sp:3:0:2:0800>To learn more about this incredible
opportunity, just head northwest to <clr:0000>Tarrey
Town<clr:ffff> and visit <clr:0000>Hudson Construction<clr:ffff>!
talk_0132:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This plot will soon be a first-rate dream
home with sweeping views of Akkala!

<sp:3:0:2:0800>To learn more about this incredible
opportunity, just head northwest to <clr:0000>Tarrey
Town<clr:ffff> and visit <clr:0000>Hudson Construction<clr:ffff>.
talk_0155:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I picked up your stuff and put it in the
room outside. Don't forget to collect it!
talk_0110:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I trust construction is going well. Is there
anything I can do for you?
talk_0156:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I led your horse away from your plot.
Don't forget to pick it up!
talk_0134:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:Happy>OK! I'll get things ready. Just a
moment, please!
talk_0111:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Wanna change your rooms? Say no more!
What can I do for you?
talk_0157:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>But don't worry—<sp:5:0:0>I made sure to leave
all the items exactly where they were.

If you ever want to take out an old room
again, just ask!
talk_0112:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>I've completed my safety inspection, and
you're good to go.
talk_0113:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Once again, congratulations on having
that construction project done.

<sp:3:0:2:0700>I hope my introduction to the whole
process was clear enough. After all, you
can have so much more built!
Maybe you'd like your house to have
more of the <clr:0000>comforts of home<clr:ffff>? Or maybe
<clr:0000>some convenient features<clr:ffff>?
<sp:3:0:2:0800>If you want to give any of that a try,
don't tarry. Just talk to Grantéson.<sp:5:0:0>
That's me!
At Hudson Construction, we offer a
variety of customization options. Just
buy a new room and remodel away!
talk_0136:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Oh, sorry. <sp:5:0:0>You're at the <clr:0000>maximum number
of rooms<clr:ffff> and can't take out any more.

<sp:3:0:2:0701>You can build your house with up to
<clr:0000><sp:2:e:3e:38004d00790048006f006d0065004200750069006c006400650072005f004f007500740070007500740048006f007500730065004e0075006d00ffff00cd> rooms<clr:ffff>! So, please adjust your
current rooms.
Place any rooms you no longer want
<clr:0000>outside your plot of land<clr:ffff>.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'll collect those when you're done
with your house's design.
talk_0159:
<sp:3:0:2:0000>I went ahead and packed up everything
you placed outside the plot.
talk_0114:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>New rooms are an investment, which is
why you can <clr:0000>preview <clr:ffff>your options so you
make the choice that's right for you.
Now then...
talk_0137:
<sp:3:0:2:0000><snd:LaughS>Thank you for your purchase!<sp:0:4:0>I'll hold on to the room you purchased.<sp:5:0:0>
Before you can place it, you'll have to
adjust your current rooms.
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Place any rooms you no longer want
<clr:0000>outside your plot of land<clr:ffff>.<clr:0000><clr:ffff>

<sp:3:0:2:0800>I'll collect those when you're done with
your house's design.
talk_0138:
<sp:3:0:2:0a00>Sorry, <sp:5:0:0>you can't take any more rooms
out unless you <clr:0000>adjust your current
rooms<clr:ffff> first.
Please place any rooms you no longer
want <clr:0000>outside your plot of land<clr:ffff>.

<sp:3:0:2:0800><snd:TalkPositive_00>I'll collect those when you're done with
your house's design.
talk_0115:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Of course. Just let me know when you're
done previewing the room!
talk_0116:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Absolutely. I hope you enjoy building your
dream home!
talk_0117:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Do you have any other requests? I'm at
your service!
talk_0118:
<sp:3:0:2:0300><snd:Sad>Sorry, <sp:5:0:0>but it looks like you don't have
enough rupees...
talk_0119: <sp:3:0:2:0800>If you need anything, just let me know!
